keyword: how many calories are in bacon
title: How Many Calories Are in Bacon?
meta_description: Learn how many calories are in bacon per slice, including full nutrition facts like fat, protein, sodium, and easy tweaks for different preparations.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Bacon?
assumptions: Pan-fried pork bacon, regular slice (approx. 8g cooked weight), no added ingredients.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, slice thickness, cooking method, and curing type. Check labels for precise values.

quick_answer.text: One slice of cooked bacon contains about 43 calories and 3g of protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in one slice of bacon?
faqs.a: Approximately 43 calories for a standard cooked slice.
Yes, one slice has about 192 mg of sodium, which is 8% of daily value.

faqs.q: How much fat is in bacon?
faqs.a: About 3.3 g total fat per slice, including 1.1 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Does cooking method affect calories in bacon?
faqs.a: Yes, frying adds minimal fat, but baking or microwaving can reduce it slightly.

faqs.q: How many calories in 100g of bacon?
faqs.a: Roughly 541 calories for cooked bacon, but varies by preparation.
